name: SQL injection attempt in the Update Environment API request -- @1.1

steps.name: Given FireBase_User sends POST request to update environment details with "' OR 1=1 --" and "' OR 1=1 --" and "' OR 1=1 --"
Then FireBase_the response should contain the error message "Bad Request" for SQL injection input
And FireBase_the response message should contain "Invalid input:"

fullName: Update Environment API: SQL injection attempt in the Update Environment API request
